Oh, and there are also poop monsters and robotic spiders.

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5514edb263687258ad850000#post_5514edb263687258ad850000
Starbound.

I was sleeping in my tent when suddenly, an NPC appeared through teleportation. I thought it was nice so I went out and then it (I think the NPC was female) started to attack me with its big ass sword while saying "I'm sorry, Floran" over and over again.

It was some kind of bounty hunter I guess. I beat it after shooting arrows in its head when it got stuck in snow.
